pages.title: Shortfin Mako Shark
pages.text: The shortfin mako shark ($(o)Isurus oxyrinchus$()), also known as the blue pointer or bonito shark, is a large mackerel shark.$(br2)It is commonly referred to as the mako shark, as is the longfin mako shark ($(o)Isurus paucus).$(br2)The shortfin mako can reach a size of 4 m ($(o)13 ft$()) in length.
